name: Hyperforce All-Stars Stories. Volume 1.
description:
Where Chaos Rains! Hyperforce All-Stars!

Join J5 the Hyperforce, Marik Ishtar (from Yu-Gi-Oh The Abridged Series) and Shuffle da Hyperforce as they go out to a party arranged by My Little Pony's Pinkie Pie and Vinyl Scratch. J5's personal hell starts when he finds out that many of his crushes have shown up to the party! With a cousin that wants to help him get laid, his Rival: Marik Ishtar causing hysteria with Yami Bakura and a bunch of Girls as far as the eye can see, This is one party you don't wanna miss! (This is a remake of a DeviantArt Literature Story of the Hyperforce All-Stars Literature Stories Episode 1.)

Check out the rest of the DeviantArt version of the Hyperforce All-Stars Stories Series by clicking here!

Editor's Note: If you speed through the VN, some of the movement animations for characters will not play out properly. Please let it finish before moving on. They move quickly anyways so no major time wasted.
